name: OpenBuild
fullText:
🔥 重构AI时代的信任机制！看 @NexusLabs 创始人 Daniel Marin @danielmarinq 专访：  

➤ 🌐打造全球首个"可验证超级计算机"：zkVM+分布式网络，让手机/笔电变身算力节点？
➤ ⚡️颠覆传统链：节点越多，网络越快  ？
➤ 🔍目标：AI模型可审计、数据可溯源、行为可验证  ？
➤ 已融资$2500万，Testnet https://t.co/wzeefNAQqy

name: Eugene Polyansky
fullText:
Your business isn’t burning you out because you’re weak.

name: Solar (Solana中文社群)
fullText:
Solar Star Growth Bootcamp 启动！ 这是由 Solar发起, @solanafndn 支持，专为 Web3 创始人、CMO、Growth Lead 打造的线上课程。

🤔 行业新周期，仅有好产品还远远不够：
如何冷启动并留住核心用户？如何打造高粘性社区？如何讲好品牌故事，放大创始人影响力？

我们将通过系统化增长框架 + https://t.co/HYL1olU92p

name: Elon Musk
fullText:
Removal of funding for enforcement of federal contempt of court orders is the actual crux of this spending bill.

This is nominally aimed at removal of illegal immigrants, but obviously also enables many other abuses of power by the President.

Should this be allowed?

name: Elon Musk
fullText: Physics sees through all lies perfectly
